Reviews.Text: I have been working with Searchminds for several years and have seen a steady increase in both website traffic and visibility in search results during that time. Their work with keyword optimization and launches has really made a difference. It is reassuring to have a dedicated contact person, while the entire team is always there with fast and helpful support. The monthly reports provide a clear overview of the development and results. I am incredibly satisfied with the collaboration and can highly recommend Searchminds!

Searchminds helps me get top results in search engines. The price of this is good, but the best part is the service. Above all, I have to highlight Frida, my contact person at Searchminds. She always takes her time with my stupid questions and is always super nice.

For those who need SEO services, Searchminds is a top company to work with.

Searchminds has increased the number of visitors to our store beyond what we had expected. In addition, they have significantly improved our position in Google's dynamic search field. We have also experienced a very lively dialogue with Searchmind, which clearly testifies to a high level of professional commitment. Their link building writers are also beyond the norm. They thoroughly understand the texts before they just write anything. I can highly recommend Searchmind if you want to move forward with your webshop.

There are many agencies that make a lot of empty promises, but few that offer quality and service like Searchminds!

This is coming from someone who has worked with SEO and created 3 websites and generally has a good foundation in marketing but when I needed to take it to the next level I got information and recommendation from Searchminds that no one has pointed out before.

Then I knew immediately that they are serious and I am very satisfied with the results I have received.

Many thanks to Widhar and Moa who have another level of service and are there as soon as you need anything.

Recommend Searchminds any day of the week!

I ended up as a customer of Searchminds without really knowing anything about the company, and with the reservation that I don't have much to compare it to, I want to give the team the highest marks for professional service, nice contacts, and as far as I can tell, they have done everything that was promised. You can't ask for more!
